Wow this cosmicjs is working great

Wish it wasn't markdown though. How the hell am I going to style things when it's all in markdown that has to be converted to html. Why not just write html in the first place. Never mind got it figured out.

How about a pic? This really sucks I have to write around the pic so it looks right. Are we still doing this stupid shit all these years later?

It IS after all one of the core languages of the World Wide Web. Using markdown to just have to convert it later to html is just fucking STUPID and whoever thought it was a good idea to start this shit should be smacked in the head.

Let's try a link

Yeah some more text would be good.
